channel.title: Best Community & Best Economy
channel.description:
out of the top 4 servers of all time (RSCD, s+orkPK (SPK), RSCA, RSCE) go from best to last.
[b]Best Community:[/b]
1. RSCD - was a great community, probably because it was invite only, and being the first proper rsc server people were too busy leveling/pking to troll. 2. RSCA - this may be biased due to me spending a large amount of time as admin there but also met some great people 3/4 (TIE) SPK/RSCE - i played little SPK/rsce, but it seemed the hardcore pking faggots were all there and too much QQ/elitism
[b]Best Economy:[/b]
1. RSCD - this economy stayed very strong, and took a long time to actually reach 99 smithing for proper rune to come out (up to 6+ months i believe, it's amazing how we played for so long without the r2h's) 2. RSCA/SPK (tie) - decent economy, whilst both very different due to a pvp and pve server, they held up quite well 3. RSCE - honestly, worst economy i have ever seen, don't know if this was due to some dupes or something but it seemed everyone had hundreds of mills and it didn't feel right.
that's my opinion, what's yours?

item.title: Best Community & Best Economy
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

tbh all players should start at level 3. It is is so unfair

Read full topic

item.title: Best Community & Best Economy
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

i also miss my newbie days. Be lvl 10ish noob, dirt poor no armor. See lvl 50 guy offer to helps me, we spend the next half an hour going from varrock mine getting iron
and then to lumby to smelt and then back to varrock to smith into full iron. Be good friends from then on out , we still speak sometimes even though none of us really
plays anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Community & Best Economy
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:16, topic:413782”][quote author=Ch3rry link=topic=515751.msg3752657#msg3752657 date=1316153773]
Exactly… It’s not something that a server is missing, it’s that we’ve grown up.
[/quote]
Today watched a level 14 approach a level 7 and ask to buy his sword. It was a Iron Short Sword. He offered him 50gp and the other guy said it’s not worth that, he can have it for 30gp… The guy buying the sword said thank-you and they made the exchange. He then asked the player he just bought the sword off if he wants to be his friend and train together. He obliged and off they went…

I haven’t seen that on a private server in 3-4 years of being in the scene.[/quote]
That’s right, RSC has newbies, and good economy, which makes it feel like RSC. I miss my newb days the most in RSC.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Community & Best Economy
item.dc:creator: @Ch3rry Ch3rry
item.description:
@Ch3rry wrote:

Exactly… It’s not something that a server is missing, it’s that we’ve grown up.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Community & Best Economy
item.dc:creator: @Ch3rry Ch3rry
item.description:
@Ch3rry wrote:

Imo, back in the RSCD days, it still felt like Runescape…The community was great, and the economy was fine. After that, everything just seemed fake… Or that’s the way it was for me anyways.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @The_Djinn The Djinn
item.description:
@The_Djinn wrote:

I’m perfectly happy with my life and I’m in a far better career than anyone I personally know at my age. As I said, you will use anything you can to try and belittle me and have done for years. Maybe you should ask yourself why you care so much?

Wondering, what is your career?

item.title: Best Community & Best Economy
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

nothing aren’t you bitching about how much money kryptix is making in another thread?

item.title: Best Community & Best Economy
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Ecko, post:48, topic:413781”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=515751.msg3751923#msg3751923 date=1316112855]

[quote author=Ecko link=topic=515751.msg3751915#msg3751915 date=1316112401]

[quote author=Kryptix link=topic=515751.msg3750727#msg3750727 date=1316019410]
Greed? So if someone scams and earns themselves 50$ it’s greed, even though they could work for a day and earn double that? It’s hardly a lot of effort anyway, it took me about 2 days to write the code required whilst everyone else was sat training… In fact, I wrote it whilst training myself whilst other people chatted on MSN or whatever. Most people who play online games like RuneScape tend to have quite a bit of time on their hands believe it or not. I know I did.[/quote]
Are you really that stupid? You’re acting as if there is no difference between legitimately working for your money and stealing money off of someone else. Why not just auto for the cash instead? Why show you’re a piece of shit and scam someone? I made $1,400 from kib (the guy who hosted Reinet’s IRC server) by selling him mills I made from autoing. Notice how I didn’t have to fuck someone over to accomplish that?

Reines didn’t need to do anything malicous as he had a community that would happily give him money. Do you really think he spent every penny collected on the OCR software? Do you really think RSCD subscriptions were 100% reinvested? He made thousands upon thousands over the years.[/quote]
You really are dumb. I think they only time anyone gave Reines anything was for his birthday and that was Kossu’s idea. Yeah, I’m sure the dildo we bought him really helped him out financially. I don’t know how long you think RSCD was even up for or how long subscriptions were even out. The first months of it being invite only was spent on finding bugs and missing/nonworking stuff. Subscriptions didn’t even come out until the last 3 months, and by then he had already invested his own money into upgrading the server. In the end, I think he walked away with less than $2,000. That’s nothing for the amount of time and work he put into creating RSCD.

I never infected anyone. I didn’t even scam people personally. As I have explained, I made a referral system for others to hand out the URL and then I’d take a 50/50 cut. It’s no different from scamming in-game saying trade me your item and I’ll dupe it or whatever…[/quote]
I never said you infected anyone. And yes you did scam. Were you taking money from others without their permission and keeping it? Yes. You scammed, no matter how much you try to spin it.

You can criticise me all you want but literally 9 out of 10 people who was able to speak to me personally would beg me to be involved back in the day and the other small percentage were ‘enemies’ or knew someone that fell for the scam.

LOL. 9/10 people my ass. You were no different from RaW and all the other low life turds who were so pixel hungry. All you were (and probably still are) is someone who cannot accomplish anything, whatsoever, for himself. You rely on others to gain some asinine thing that won’t help you in the long run. Why not do the world a favor and lie face down on some railroad tracks?

Geez dude, fucking chill now, it’s only fucking virtual money in a virtual game, that he stole from 12 year old kids that have nolife and are complete dickheads and retarded enough to go on phishing site.

How about you hop off his dick? The problem isn’t just what he did. It’s the fact that he still thinks he did nothing wrong. Therefore, he hasn’t shown any remorse as Davidi2 suggested he did and should be banned from this forum.

All you’ve done is display your idiocy with Kryptix’s ginger penis in your mouth. diaf (y)[/quote]
It’s funny how your head’s got messed up of being on computer 24/7. Don’t know why you think “I’m on his dick”, because I’m just pointing out my opinion which happens to be the same as his. I think what he did was “wrong” the same way as if you piss on the street, It’s not that serious, it’s quite funny how you take it so seriously.

Read full topic

All you were (and probably still are) is someone who cannot accomplish anything, whatsoever, for himself. You rely on others to gain some asinine thing that won’t help you in the long run. Why not do the world a favor and lie face down on some railroad tracks?

Geez dude, fucking chill now, it’s only fucking virtual money in a virtual game, that he stole from 12 year old kids that have nolife and are complete dickheads and retarded enough to go on phishing site.[/quote]
How about you hop off his dick? The problem isn’t just what he did. It’s the fact that he still thinks he did nothing wrong. Therefore, he hasn’t shown any remorse as Davidi2 suggested he did and should be banned from this forum.

All you’ve done is display your idiocy with Kryptix’s ginger penis in your mouth. diaf (y)

item.title: Best Community & Best Economy
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:44, topic:413781"][quote author=Ecko link=topic=515751.msg3750642#msg3750642 date=1316009235]

When it was years ago and they admit to doing it (while knowing it was wrong at the same time [remorse], not just bragging about it or something) it’s a bit different.

And what he did back then shouldn’t matter now, since it happened 10 years ago. And people that are still flaming him about that are either immature or jealous, they would have done the same if they could, who wouldn’t want pixels that you can sell for lots of $? In the end it’s just a game and people are overreacting, and once again it happened long time ago and doesn’t matter now.

Immature or jealous? Numerous people I knew were in positions to scam so much money or infect bots they made, but didn’t because they aren’t greedy, soulless gingers. It’s immaturity and jealousy that fuels the types of actions Kryptix made back then.

After all, it’s just a game, so who cares if turkish idiot infects us?

Then they are fucking idiots tbh, if you could get loads of cash why wouldn’t you?, and you have to be extremely retarded if you get infected by turkish idiot.

… Probably because it’s pathetic, immature, dishonest, and fucking low. Obviously those traits are something you admire, so good luck in life you greedy bitch.

And I’m sure no one here thinks Reines is a ‘fucking idiot’ (besides you of course).
[/quote]
How’s it pathetic, I think it’s more like being smart. And I aint talking about people that have created bots servers or anything like that, I’m talking about RSC/RS2 phishing, and virtual item scamming.[/quote]
It shows what depths someone would go to just to obtain some extra money. It’s called greed btw. I’m sure you’ve heard of it.

Read full topic

You and darkevil did Destructokil, cause i remember reading his report on rscn and forwarding it to mediator. Oh well, those days have gone, shame all thats left is you.
[/quote]

If you have proof, we ban for scamming here. Private message me. If not, sorry.
inb4SomeoneReportsYou

item.title: Best Community & Best Economy
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

Luke you have your own definition

[left]http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=kryptix[/left]

[size=8pt]

  1. kryptix 36 up, 20 down
    A lonely boy that spends all his time in the basement stealing and scamming other players in MMORPG and macroing and them claiming he is the best. His shear weight and the fact his hair is a shaved is a true example of his care for the real world.
    www.runescaqe.com < er, he owns that domain. Scam anyone?

  2. kryptix 27 up, 19 down

  3. A fat retarded monkey, that spends half of its day trying to shove its tail up his own ass. The other half of the day it is either attempting to find its cock or hacking and scamming people on a MMORPG. see wannabegangsterbitch

item.title: Best Community & Best Economy

item.description:
@Everyonedies wrote:

xEnt, your server had the best community, most helpful and enjoyable enviroment. Even from back in RSC days, Luke wasnt liked by any of the realscape players… Him and his little bumboy darkevil3k on their keylogging spree, you could call them the original trolls of RSC. Kryptix/Kryptik/Luke no doubt has built a huge and highly successful server, however a huge chunk of that community are childish idiots who troll for fun and probaly never played real rsc… Personally i think you should stick to photography. Always has so much to say, mainly denying things or directing his own opinion as the superior one… I dont see why people want to play a server owned and ran by someone as aragant, ignorant and self obsessed as the mighty script kiddy Kryptix… But thats just my opinion.
